GNA 30 E BJI FAR 30 SSE JMS 35 N MBG Y22 35 NW Y22 15 SSE DIK 40 NE
DIK 10 SSE N60 55 ESE MOT 30 NE HCO.

GNA HIB 40 SW DTL 15 E MBG 55 N PHP RAP 60 NW CDR DGW CPR 50 SE WRL
45 S SHR SHR 20 WNW 4BQ BHK 35 W N60 40 WNW HCO.
